name: Parallel Search
description: Parallel Search allows you to run searches over the web using Parallel's intelligent search API. It returns ranked web URLs with compressed, relevant excerpts ready for agents to use.

inputs.title: Parallel API Key
inputs.description: Your Parallel.ai API key for authenticating requests.

inputs.title: Search Objective
inputs.description: The overall objective or question you want to answer with the search.
inputs.default: When was the United Nations established? Prefer UN's websites.

inputs.title: Search Queries
inputs.description: A list of search queries to run for fulfilling your objective.

inputs.title: Processor Type
inputs.description: Which search processor to use, e.g. 'base' for basic search.

inputs.title: Max Results
inputs.description: Maximum number of search results to return.

inputs.title: Max Characters Per Result
inputs.description: Maximum number of characters per individual search result excerpt.
